      public Product addProduct​(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String description, float price, float discountedPrice, Category category) throws java.lang.Exception
      Adds an product to the system
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the product
      description - the description of the product
      price - the price of the product
      discountedPrice - the discounted Price of the product
      category - the category of the product
      Returns:
      the added product
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception - if the prices are not correct
